title: Verb collection 4
sentences: When does the movie finally start?
I still have to fill out the form.
Können Sie den Brief bitte hier
Can you please sign the letter here?
nächsten Monat in eine neue Wohnung um.
We are moving into a new apartment next month.
In the evening he likes to watch TV for two hours.
I shop at the supermarket every Saturday.
I would like to get to know you.
The meeting takes place in the conference room.
Ich muss über dein Angebot kurz
I have to think about your offer for a moment.
What do you suggest for the weekend?
Können Sie mir diesen Satz bitte
Can you please explain this sentence to me?
Sie die E-Mail so schnell wie möglich.
Please answer the email as soon as possible.
Can you please repeat the word?
I want to improve my German.
Sie mir bitte mehr über Ihre Arbeit.
Please tell me more about your work.
We are trying to be on time.
Which app do you use the most?
I am visiting my grandparents tomorrow.
I recommend this movie to you.
Kannst du mir bitte beim Kochen
Can you please help me with cooking?
Would you like to bring something along to eat?
Ich möchte dich zu meiner Party
I want to invite you to my party.
Ich möchte die Preise im Internet
I want to compare the prices on the internet.
dictionary:
anrufen - to call (on the phone)
anfangen - to start / begin
ausfüllen - to fill out
unterschreiben - to sign
umziehen - to move (house)
aussehen - to look / appear
fernsehen - to watch TV
einkaufen - to shop
kennenlernen - to get to know
stattfinden - to take place
nachdenken - to think about
vorschlagen - to suggest
erklären - to explain
verstehen - to understand
beantworten - to answer
wiederholen - to repeat
verbessern - to improve
erzählen - to tell / narrate
versuchen - to try
benutzen - to use
besuchen - to visit
empfehlen - to recommend
helfen - to help
vergessen - to forget
mitbringen - to bring along
einladen - to invite
vorbereiten - to prepare
aufhören - to stop
vergleichen - to compare
entscheiden - to decide
das Formular - form
der Brief - letter
die Wohnung - apartment
das Wochenende - weekend
das Abendessen - dinner
